Hi Steph,

You need to configure the mime filter on the Deduplicator module=
 as well as during indexing.

Assuming you are using the Heritrix 3 variant=
, it would go something like:

<bean id=3D"deduplicator" class=3D"is.landsb=
okasafn.deduplicator.DeDuplicator">
   ....
  <property name=3D"mimeFilter"=
 value=3D"foo/bar" />
  <property name=3D"blacklist" value=3D"true" />
   .=
...
</bean>

- Kris

> Hi everybody!
>
> I'm using th=
e Deduplicator with the following settings
>
> mimeFilter =3D foo/bar (to i=
nclude text/*) blacklist =3D true
>
> I made the index with the follwong co=
mmand:
>
> HERETRIX_HOME/dedupdigest -mime ^foo/bar -o http://example.com -=
s -t
> [location1] [location2]
>
> The crawl and the Deduplicator work just=
 fine, but when I look at the
> reports afterwards it seems that the Dedupl=
icator still doesn't
> handle all crawled urls.
>
> Some numbers as an expl=
anation:
> Url success =3D 4595 (given in the Crawl Report) Total handled =
=3D 1783
> (given in the Processors Report by the Deduplicator) New =3D 577=
 (given
> in the Processors Report by the Deduplicator)
>
> Shouldn't the n=
umber of Url success be the same as the number of
> elements handled by the=
 Deduplicator if I include text/*?
>
> Thanks in advance for helping me!
>
=
> Steph
